After LVL 9 game crashes. 

Error - texture2.fbq is corrupted. Reinstall the game. 

Tried reinstalling, didn't help. Downloaded and tried Stiflers torrent. The same. Guessing that skidrow messed up.

Same texture2.fbq error.

Maybe the file from one of the other Trine 2 versions would work.

Well my hunch was right.

If you take texture2.fbq from this torrent:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7607655/Trine_2_%5Bv1.18%5D___Goblin_Menace_DLC_(2012)_PC___THETA

...then it passes the file check and level 10 loads without error. The files are the same size but skidrow messed up somehow.

Maybe one of VIP's would like to upload the 400 meg file as a fix?

I've completed lvl 10 using this and lvl 11 loads.

Oh it's just 1 byte, if you have a hex editor:

>fc /b texture2.fbq texture2.fbq.skidrow
Comparing files TEXTURE2.FBQ and TEXTURE2.FBQ.SKIDROW
1BEF647A: DC DD
